name: For the King (itch) (Xeroera)
description:
For the King is a coze 3D Quest Game where you have to prepare the next Match of Chess. So your helping the Black King to prepare the best you can and do Quest for the other Chess figures.  

- An open Area where you can freely move around.
- Lot´s of NPCs with Dialogue.
- Easter Eggs

Recommended Input is the Keyboard.  

The Game can also be found on the Itch.io Site of the HTK. https://htkacademy.itch.io/
This Game was the second Semester Project of the Hamburger Technische Kunsthochschule (HTK)

Credits

Music from Epidemic sound and Audio Jungle.

Modell Inspiration from Sketchfab.

Markting Itch.io

Special Thanks to all my Classmates who helped me getting the Game done.
